column1: * and ^ decided to go on a trip together. They enjoyed sightseeing and each other's company.
* and ^ planned a romantic vacation with each other. They had a wonderful time together!
* proposed to ^ where they had their first date. ^ said yes!
* and ^ talked about moving in together at ^'s place. Both were excited about the idea.
* and ^ celebrated their anniversary with a lovely romantic night together.
* talked to ^'s parents about proposing to ^. They excitedly gave * their blessing!
* and ^ had a fancy dinner and danced all night; afterward * proposed - and ^ said yes!
